attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand that the Punch and Judy style of debate in the Houses of Parliment and the Lords stop as soon as possible and real adult politicians who are in receipt of taxpayers money, have proper debates in a respectful manner with genuine passionate arguments without the catcalls and personal jibes which are more at home in the Student Union bars of Oxford and Cambridge .
"REAL POLITICAL DEBATES FROM ADULT ELECTED REPRESENTITVES".

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
